trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_SEQ_00<tab>Cirina does not usually depend on the kindness of strangers, but will gladly make an exception today.
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_010<tab>You...you want to help me, is that it?
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_011<tab>I do not know what to say... Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you!
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_012<tab>The lumbering ones we must fell wander the plains to the west of Reunion. If we each harvest two, then we should have enough whisperroot.
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_013<tab>Return here when you have finished. Good luck!
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Have you brought the whisperroot?
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_021<tab>Blessed is he who shows kindness to strangers, for with fortune does he ever ride.

TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_MASGUD_000_024<tab>The gods favor you more than you know, child. Udgan rarely have need of such herbs, and so my stock is limited. Had you come a day earlier or later, I would have none for you.
TEXT_STMBDA402_02501_CIRINA_000_025<tab>Perhaps the gods guided me here, as they guided Grandmother. As they guided this <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> from the West...
